briefTitle: Clinical Trial in Patients Diagnosed With Immune Thrombocytopenic Purpura
officialTitle: Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and the Safety of IGIV3I Grifols 10% (Human Intravenous Immunoglobulin) in Patients Diagnosed With Immune Thrombocytopenic Purpura
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether IGIV3I Grifols 10% is effective in the treatment of immune thrombocytopenic purpura.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: At any time during the study period (The platelet count was measured at Days 1-6, 10, 14. 21, 30, 60, 90).
